name: d3-force-surface
description: A multi-surface elastic collision force type for the d3-force simulation engine.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-force-surface.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run bundle && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-force-surface.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-surface.min.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-force-surface.bundle.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-surface.bundle.min.js
